homePage.title: Welcome to Craft Your Pixel
homePage.description: We transform ideas into digital reality. Explore our innovative web and mobile solutions that elevate your online presence.

aboutUs.title: Who We Are
aboutUs.description: Craft Your Pixel is a passionate team of web designers and developers committed to crafting exceptional digital experiences. With 10 years of expertise, we blend creativity and technology to bring your vision to life.

services.title: Our Expertise
services.description: Explore our comprehensive range of services: Custom Website Design, Responsive Web Development, Mobile App Development (iOS & Android), E-commerce Solutions, UI/UX Design, Website Maintenance.

portfolio.title: Our Work
portfolio.description: View our portfolio showcasing the diverse projects we've undertaken. Witness the seamless integration of design and functionality that sets our work apart.

caseStudies.title: Success Stories
caseStudies.description: Dive deeper into our success stories. Learn how we have helped businesses like yours achieve their digital goals through tailored solutions and innovative strategies.

process.title: How We Work
process.description: Discover our streamlined development process. From concept to delivery, we ensure transparent communication and collaboration, keeping you informed at every stage.

blog.title: Insights & Trends
blog.description: Stay updated with the latest trends, industry insights, and tips from our experts. Explore articles covering web design, development, and digital marketing.

contactUs.title: Get in Touch
contactUs.description: Reach out to us for inquiries, collaborations, or to discuss your project. We're here to turn your ideas into reality. Let's build something great together!

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Hear from satisfied clients who have experienced the impact of our services firsthand. Discover the value we bring to businesses across different industries.

faqs.answer_1: We offer a range of services including custom website design, responsive web development, mobile app development (iOS and Android), e-commerce solutions, UI/UX design, and website maintenance.
faqs.question_2: How long does it take to complete a project?
faqs.answer_2: The timeline for each project varies depending on its complexity and specific requirements. We work closely with our clients to establish realistic timelines and milestones.
faqs.question_3: What is the cost of your services?
faqs.answer_3: The cost of our services depends on the scope and complexity of the project. We provide personalized quotes after discussing your specific needs and goals.
faqs.question_4: Do you offer website maintenance services?
faqs.answer_4: Yes, we provide ongoing website maintenance services to ensure your site remains secure, up-to-date, and performs optimally. Our maintenance plans are tailored to meet the unique needs of each client.
faqs.question_5: Can you redesign an existing website?
faqs.answer_5: Absolutely! We specialize in website redesigns to give your online presence a fresh and modern look. Whether it's a visual makeover or functionality improvements, we've got you covered.
faqs.question_6: What technologies do you use for web development?
faqs.answer_6: We leverage a variety of technologies based on project requirements. Our expertise includes but is not limited to HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and popular CMS platforms such as WordPress.
faqs.question_7: Do you provide mobile app development for both iOS and Android?
faqs.answer_7: Yes, we offer mobile app development services for both iOS and Android platforms. Our experienced team ensures that your app is seamlessly optimized for each operating system.
